summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Liquid Foundation Cream, Concealer Cover Cream, BB Cream, Flawless Colour Changing Foundation Makeup Base Nude Face Liquid Cover Concealer, Universal for ALL Skin Types, SPF 15 Shell, 1.41 Fl Oz Review Date: 2019/09/17 Store: BUOCEANS Official Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Pores, Dryness', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 1.8 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: I am so glad they made a product like this because I can never seem to find the right color to match my skin and I end up with that Foundation the line on my chin with the two different colors. Not only is this product lightweight, it smells nice, plus it blends in with my skin tone almost perfectly. This is definitely going to be my go to Foundation. Review Title: Awesome foundation! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Mask,Natural Repair Rejuvenating Hair Mask,Moisturizing Nourishing Hair for Dry and Damaged Hair,Professional Heating Deep Conditioning Hair Treatment Review Date: 2019/10/26 Store: LDREAMAM Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LDREAMAM', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '2 Count', 'Package Type': 'Jar', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.08 x 0.79 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} Review Text: Made my hair soft again! Not the easiest thing to get on when you have long hair but I managed. Then after the time required I wash my hair and couldn't believe how soft it was. It hasn't been that soft in a long time. So I definitely think it was worth the trouble stuffing all my hair in there and letting it sit plus it doesn't smell the greatest, nor does it smell bad I'm just used to very perfumed shampoos. But I'll definitely be using it again. Review Title: Softness again! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sea Salt Soap, Sea Mineral Soap, Invigorating Bath Soap, Cleaner Removal Pimple Pores Acne Goat Milk Moisturizing Face Care Soap, for All Skin type Review Date: 2019/11/10 Store: AMINZER Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'AMINZER', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '3.43 x 3.27 x 1.42 inches; 4.27 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1107-149'} Review Text: Great for your pores and acne. My husband's back started breaking out and after using this for a few days it's clearing up and looks less irritated. Plus it came with a bag which I didn't know what for until I read the instructions and it is a foaming bag and it really makes the soap foam! Review Title: Good for your pores 🧼🧼🧼 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Color Changing Nail Polish, Gel Nail Polish Set, Nail Thermal Sensitive Liquid, Black Nail Polish Gel, Nail Art Brush Changeable Color Changing Liquid Kit 4Parts Review Date: 2020/05/29 Store: Cherioll Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Cherioll', 'Included Components': 'Gel Nail polish', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '8.3 x 6 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I've had an obsession with gels with my time off from work these past months and I wanted to try this color changing polish.
It comes with designs and while the color itself is dark it does change.
I am enjoying trying the designs but man it does take practice!!! Review Title: Been obsessed with gels 💅🏻 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Poly Gel Nail Kit, opove Nail Builder Gel Extension Nail thickening Solution French Nail Art Equitment - 6 Colors 15ML Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: opove Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '13.78 x 5.91 x 1.97 inches; 1.82 Pounds'} Review Text: Never tried poly gel before, definitely not easy but worth it! Check out my nails in the photo, came out beautifully and they are very strong! Review Title: Check these nails out! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Polish Remover Tools Set, 10pcs Nail Clip Caps, 2pcs Nail File, 100pcs Nail Remover Cotton Pads, 1pc Brush, 2pcs Sponge Finger Separator, 2 Cuticle Scraper and Pusher,1pc Pump Dispenser Bottle Review Date: 2020/09/20 Store: Lahien Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lahien', 'Item Form': 'Wipe', 'Unit Count': '5.2911 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.09 x 1.57 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '782910194566'} Review Text: This kit comes with everything you need to take off nail polish.
This particular set was for my mother in law who is just getting into gel polishes and she didn't understand what the clips were for at first 🤣
After I showed her how it took off the polish with scrubbing she was SOOOOO glad I got her this set! Review Title: Perfect for removal Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: UV LED Nail Lamp, UPGRADE 90W Nail Dryer with Fan to Relieve Burns, Fast Dry Gel Polish Lamp Professional Curing Light for Fingernail and Toenail Auto Sensor Nail Machine Review Date: 2020/09/24 Store: JYSW Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 7 x 3.5 inches; 1.28 Pounds'} Review Text: This nail lamp was bought for myself and the girls when we meet up for beauty time!
We keep fighting over who is going to use the lamp next so we decided to get a few of them Lol.

Now this one in particular I enjoy using because it dries fast plus I don't feel the heat so much like other lamps. Definitely a good one in my book! Review Title: Dries quick! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Liquid Foundation Cream, Concealer Cover Cream, BB Cream, Flawless Colour Changing Foundation Makeup Base Nude Face Liquid Cover Concealer, Universal for ALL Skin Types, SPF 15 Shell, 1.41 Fl Oz Review Date: 2019/09/17 Store: BUOCEANS Official Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Pores, Dryness', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 1.8 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: I am so glad they made a product like this because I can never seem to find the right color to match my skin and I end up with that Foundation the line on my chin with the two different colors. Not only is this product lightweight, it smells nice, plus it blends in with my skin tone almost perfectly. This is definitely going to be my go to Foundation. Review Title: Awesome foundation! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user's experiences with beauty and personal care products have been overwhelmingly positive. They expressed satisfaction with the effectiveness of a foundation that provided a perfect skin match and lightweight feel, indicating a strong preference for products that offer natural results. The nourishing effects of a hair mask also garnered praise, as it restored softness to dry hair, despite some application challenges. Furthermore, the user highlighted the efficacy of a face soap that improved skin clarity, demonstrating a preference for products that positively impact skin health. The excitement for gel nail products was evident, with successful nail art outcomes and enjoyment in experimenting with new designs. Accessories for nail care also received positive feedback, particularly for their comprehensive utility.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
While the user's experiences were largely favorable, there were some minor concerns noted. The application process for certain products, like the hair mask, was described as difficult, indicating frustration with usability, particularly for individuals with longer hair. Additionally, the user mentioned that the hair mask's scent was neutral rather than fragrant, contrasting with their usual preference for perfumed products. Some nail application products required practice, and the user acknowledged that ease of use could be an issue for beginners, especially with color-changing polish.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user's shopping behavior indicates a strong affinity for beauty products that deliver effective results and enhance personal care routines. Positive experiences overwhelmingly highlight satisfaction with product performance and enjoyment of creative processes. However, minor usability challenges with specific products and a preference for more fragrant options reflect some areas for improvement. The user appears committed to exploring and investing in beauty items that promote self-expression and personal refinement while acknowledging certain limitations.

target_interaction.title: Waterproof!
target_interaction.text:
Got this bag to wash the dogs feet in when they come in from outside.
So tired of trying to wash them and I've tried the small bucket thing to dip their feet but they don't work cuz their feet are so big, lol.
This bag I just fill up and have them walk right in and I clean them up, works great! No water leaks!
target_interaction.title_meta: Emirde Collapsible Foot Bath Basin for Travel, Multifunctional Waterproof Portable Foot Tub for Soaking Feet, Washing Clothes, Vegetables and Fruits, Outdoor, Camping (21L)
